casebody.data:
Betty CALHOUN et al., Plaintiffs, v. UNITED STATES of America et al., Defendants. No. 77-2963. United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Sept. 18, 1979. J. Warren Beall, Oceanside, Cal., Cohn & Pacelli, Tustin, Cal., for plaintiffs. Donald F. Shanahan, Asst. U. S. Atty., San Diego, Cal., for defendants.

Before BROWNING and TANG, Circuit Judges, and MUECKE,* District Judge.

Honorable C. A. Muecke, United States District Judge of the District of Arizona, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

The judgment below is affirmed. Judge Enright’s opinion, reported at 475 F.Supp. 1, is adopted as the opinion of this court.
